query: Q74. If you had to send a file to a colleague, how could you collect everything needed to work on it, including any non-Adobe fonts and linked images?
options:
Select **Select All** and then **Save Selection**.
 Use the **Save as Template** command.
 Use the **Package** command.
 Select **Select All** and then click the **Add Content** button in the **Libraries** panel.

**Explanation:**
From Adobe Help Center: [Share artwork](https://helpx.adobe.com/illustrator/how-to/sharing-basics.html)

query: Q76. Which option do you use to create the stroke shown below?
options:
Round Join
 Projecting Cap
 Round Cap
 Align Stroke to Outside

**Explanation:**
From Youtube Channel: [How to Round End of Path (Line) in Illustrator](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UCQb-JTRIm4&t=92s)
